mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (member_id, password, name, gender, tel, email, birth, signin_date, agree_email, agree_sns) VALUES (#{member_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{birth}, sysdate, #{agree_email}, #{agree_sns})
mapper.select: SELECT c.C_AMOUNT AS C_AMOUNT, g.goods_id goods_id, g.GOODS_NAME GOODS_NAME, g.IMG_FILE IMG_FILE, g.PRICE PRICE, g.DELIVERY_CHARGE DELIVERY_CHARGE FROM Cart c INNER JOIN GOODS g ON c.GOODS_ID = g.GOODS_ID INNER JOIN "MEMBER" m ON c.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE m.MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Cart WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND goods_id = #{goods_id}
